name: Athey & Luca: Economists in Tech
description: JEP article 'Economists (and Economics) in Tech Companies' - foundational reading on why tech hires economists. Amazon employs 150+ PhD economists. Focuses on causal inference, market design, incentives. Full PDF: https://gsb-faculty.stanford.edu/susan-athey/files/2022/04/economists_in_tech.pdf
summary: This resource provides insights into the role of economists in tech companies, emphasizing the importance of skills like causal inference and market design. It highlights the growing trend of hiring economists in the tech industry and the unique perspectives they bring.

to explore career opportunities for economists in tech
